OrgName.entry: MENOPAUSE AND PRE-MENSTRUAL SYNDROME CLINICS, NHS SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: Offers advice, information and treatment for problems related to hormone imbalance, particularly menopause and pre-menstrual syndrome. Clinics are held at the Central Health Clinic. GP or self-referral for Sheffield residents. Women living outside the Sheffield area need GP or Health Worker referral.

Address.entry: Sheffield Contraception and Sexual Health Service
